content: As Samantha stretches and opens up her body on the bed, Tim can't help but notice the way the morning light filters in through the window and highlights her form. He takes note of the way her muscles tense and relax as she stretches, and the way her hair falls around her face. He notices the way her chest rises and falls with her breath, and the way her bare skin glows in the sunlight. Despite the innocence of the moment, Tim can't help but feel a sense of awe and wonder at the beauty of the scene before him.
